article.title: Cataloguing in Publication: A New Programme of Pre-Publication Cataloguingin the United States of America, with Comments on some Similar Programmes
article.author: Clapp, Verner W.
article.text: The cataloguing in source experiment carried out by the United States Library of Congress ended in 1959.. Studies on the feasibility of a new pre-publication cataloguing programme were undertaken and on 1 July 1971 a new cataloguing in publication programmes were started.. Other programmes for pre-publication cataloguing, namely in Brazil and the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, are described..
